columns.name: estimate_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each estimate record.

columns.name: estimate_number
columns.description: Unique number assigned to each estimate for tracking purposes.

columns.name: client_code
columns.description: Code identifying the client associated with the estimate.

columns.name: project_code
columns.description: Code identifying the project related to the estimate.

columns.name: issue_date
columns.description: Date when the estimate was issued to the client.

columns.name: currency
columns.description: Currency in which the estimate amounts are denominated.

columns.name: total_amount
columns.description: Total monetary value of the estimate.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the estimate, indicating its progress or approval state.

columns.name: invoice_line_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each line item in an invoice.

columns.name: invoice_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the line item to its parent invoice.

columns.name: line_no
columns.description: Sequential number indicating the order of the line item in the invoice.

columns.name: description
columns.description: Textual description of the goods or services billed in the line item.

columns.name: qty
columns.description: Quantity of items or services billed in the line item.

columns.name: unit_price
columns.description: Price per unit of the item or service in the line item.

columns.name: invoice_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each invoice record.

columns.name: invoice_number
columns.description: Unique number assigned to each invoice for tracking purposes.

columns.name: client_code
columns.description: Code identifying the client associated with the invoice.

columns.name: project_code
columns.description: Code identifying the project related to the invoice.

columns.name: po_number
columns.description: Purchase order number associated with the invoice.

columns.name: issue_date
columns.description: Date when the invoice was issued to the client.

columns.name: due_date
columns.description: Date by which the invoice payment is due.

columns.name: currency
columns.description: Currency in which the invoice amounts are denominated.

columns.name: subtotal_amount
columns.description: Total amount before taxes and additional charges.

columns.name: tax_amount
columns.description: Total tax amount applied to the invoice.

columns.name: total_amount
columns.description: Total monetary value of the invoice including taxes.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the invoice, indicating its payment or approval state.

columns.name: payment_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each payment record.

columns.name: invoice_number
columns.description: Number of the invoice to which the payment is applied.

columns.name: payment_date
columns.description: Date when the payment was received.

columns.name: method
columns.description: Method used for the payment, such as credit card or bank transfer.

columns.name: amount
columns.description: Monetary amount of the payment received.

columns.name: reference
columns.description: Reference information for tracking the payment.

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the client to their industry.

columns.name: industry_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the industry to the client.

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each client record.

columns.name: client_code
columns.description: Unique code assigned to each client for identification.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Full name of the client or client organization.

columns.name: billing_email
columns.description: Email address used for sending billing information to the client.

columns.name: phone
columns.description: Primary contact phone number for the client.

columns.name: is_active
columns.description: Indicates whether the client is currently active.

columns.name: contact_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each contact record.

columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the contact to their associated client.

columns.name: contact_email
columns.description: Email address of the contact person.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: First name of the contact person.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Last name of the contact person.

columns.name: title
columns.description: Job title or position of the contact person.

columns.name: phone
columns.description: Contact phone number for the contact person.

columns.name: is_primary
columns.description: Indicates if the contact is the primary contact for the client.

columns.name: industry_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each industry record.

columns.name: code
columns.description: Code representing the industry category.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the industry category.

columns.name: phase_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each project phase.

columns.name: project_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the phase to its parent project.

columns.name: phase_code
columns.description: Code representing the specific phase of a project.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the project phase.

columns.name: ppo_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each project purchase order.

columns.name: project_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the purchase order to its associated project.

columns.name: po_number
columns.description: Purchase order number associated with the project.

columns.name: project_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each project record.

columns.name: project_code
columns.description: Unique code assigned to each project for identification.

columns.name: name
columns.description: Name of the project.

columns.name: client_code
columns.description: Code identifying the client associated with the project.

columns.name: primary_contact_email
columns.description: Email address of the primary contact for the project.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the project, indicating its progress or completion state.

columns.name: start_date
columns.description: Date when the project is scheduled to start.

columns.name: end_date
columns.description: Date when the project is scheduled to end.

columns.name: task_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each task within a project.

columns.name: project_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the task to its parent project.

columns.name: phase_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the task to its associated project phase.

columns.name: title
columns.description: Title or name of the task.

columns.name: assignee
columns.description: Person responsible for completing the task.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the task, indicating its progress or completion state.

columns.name: estimate_hrs
columns.description: Estimated number of hours required to complete the task.

columns.name: time_entry_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each time entry record.

columns.name: project_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the time entry to its associated project.

columns.name: task_id
columns.description: Identifier linking the time entry to its associated task.

columns.name: work_date
columns.description: Date when the work was performed.

columns.name: worker_email
columns.description: Email address of the worker who logged the time.

columns.name: hours
columns.description: Number of hours worked as recorded in the time entry.

columns.name: notes
columns.description: Additional notes or comments about the time entry.
